title.label: This game is awesome, and here are some suggestions!

content.label: So, this game is amazing, and I‚Äôm sure many people agree with me. I agree with someone else who wrote a review, we should be able to go to an ocean habitat! However, every habitat like garden or Jurassic has to be unlocked. So I suggest that it should be unlocked at a cave setting, that goes right after tundra! It could have snakes, panthers, crows, ect. I fully understand that it is hard to come up with new biomes because you can‚Äôt have the same animal in two biomes. I also suggest a forest biome. No, not the jungle, a forest. You could have foxes that dart in and out of the map, so it is hard to ride them. There could be owls, snakes, deer, squirrels and bobcats. One more thing that is probably not going to happen but would make my life easier is if you can make the option to make an account. I would like this because my iPod glitches me out of the game sometimes, so when I get a phone it would be awesome to move my existing rodeo stampede progress onto my future phone. Thanks! You made a great game, so keep adding! Ps please make a volleyulture! Um sorry I‚Äôm still going but I just came up with a possible habitat. The desert! I know you have Australia, but there aren‚Äôt dunes and camels and cactuses in Australia! Actually, there are cactuses. My bad. Anyways, you could put camels and snakes and maybe parrots as a reference to Aladdin and you could be riding around a town that‚Äôs there.... oh jeez another idea of riding around a farm or a neighborhood oh my! Wow. Well, I do hope you see this and at least make one of these sycho suggestions come to life!
